coverText: Mastering Angular in Modern Web Development

chapters.title: Introduction to Angular
chapters.content: Angular is a powerful framework for building complex applications. In this article, we'll explore the fundamentals and best practices of using Angular for large-scale projects...

chapters.title: Components and Services
chapters.content: Understanding Angular's component-based architecture is key to mastering this framework. Components define the structure, while services handle data sharing across components...

chapters.title: State Management with RxJS
chapters.content: Using RxJS for state management allows for seamless data flow in Angular applications. Learn how to use observables, operators, and best practices for managing app state efficiently...

coverText: Building Robust APIs with API Platform and Symfony

chapters.title: Getting Started with API Platform
chapters.content: API Platform is an open-source framework built on Symfony, designed to simplify the creation of RESTful and GraphQL APIs. In this guide, we’ll explore the setup and configuration...

chapters.title: Defining Data Models and Serialization
chapters.content: Understanding how to model data and serialize responses is crucial in API development. Learn how to define models, use Doctrine ORM, and serialize data for efficient API responses...

chapters.title: Testing and Securing APIs
chapters.content: Building secure and well-tested APIs ensures reliability and trust. Explore best practices for securing endpoints and writing integration tests using Symfony’s built-in tools...

relatedArticles.title: Integrating React with Symfony and API Platform
